divs: Sighting DetailsGeorge Moses,his wife,my girlfriend and I were standing in George's front yard.His wife was talking to my girlfriend about 15 feet away from us and George and I were talking when George was looking up and asked me what was that as he pointed up in the sky above us.I looked up and said it was getting smaller as if going straight up and as we were watching it get smaller,yet visible,it stopped and shot to the right so fast that the two of us looked at each other in almost shock.I told him that what ever that was,it is definitely something that we don't have cause we don't have anything that can move that fast.Whatever it was,it was black in color against the clear blue sky's.I told George not to tell anyone what we saw cause they'd only think that were crazy.In my opinion,it is foolish to believe that we are the only life in the many universes out there.In fact it's totally vain.I haven't seen nor heard from George in about 11yrs.So if you'd like to verify my claims for validity,I'd ask George in Hawaii.I have lived up here in the Mainland since 2004 and like I said I don't know where he is,but I'm sure he's in Hawaii somewhere's.As the years go by,I'm sure we will see a lot more sightings cause they're just watching us and who knows why.Some how I believe they probably figured out how to utilize smaller nuclear explosions to propel they're crafts.All I know it's awesome to actually see it for yourself and realize how far behind man is to they're knowledge.It's probably because we waste to much energy and resourses fighting with one another thay we don't see the big picture,which is to find our creator,travel and find new worlds and universes.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Honolulu
There were no other sightings in Honolulu on or around May 31st 1999
Summary: My friend George Moses pointed up at a black dot and asked me what it was and it started getting smaller then in a snap of a finger it shot to the right and was gone.Shy was clear at the time.
